snippet: KLEIMAN--Elaine (Appel). Loving mother of Ellen (Paul) Richman and Rita (Lawrence) Zeff, grandmother of six and their spouses and great-grandmother of ten. She was predeceased by her devoted husband Jack. She passed away peacefully on January 9, 2016 in her 99th year. She will be greatly missed by all. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLEIMAN--Elaine (Appel). Loving mother of Ellen (Paul) Richman and Rita (Lawrence) Zeff, grandmother of six and their spouses and great-grandmother of ten. She was predeceased by her devoted husband Jack. She passed away peacefully on January 9, 2016 in her 99th year. She will be greatly missed by all. 1/3
